introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Lunar API Service is a RESTful API that provides accurate information about lunar phases. You can use this API to get data about the current lunar phase, a specific date, or to get detailed lunar information.
introduction.paragraph2: The API is available 24/7 and is hosted on Vercel, ensuring high availability and low latency.

currentPhase.title: Current Lunar Phase
currentPhase.description: Returns the current lunar phase with illumination and corresponding emoji.

specificDate.title: Lunar Phase for Specific Date
specificDate.description: Returns the lunar phase for a specific date. The date format must be YYYY-MM-DD.

detailedInfo.title: Detailed Lunar Information
detailedInfo.description: Returns detailed lunar information, including age, distance, next full moon and new moon.

limits.title: Limits and Considerations
limits.description: The API is free and doesn't require authentication. However, please use it responsibly. Lunar calculations are based on astronomical algorithms and provide accurate results for dates between 1900 and 2100.

security.title: Security
security.description: The Lunar API has been designed with security as a priority. Here are the security measures implemented:
security.rateLimiting: Rate Limiting: To prevent abuse, the API limits requests to 100 per IP every 15 minutes.
security.inputValidation: Input Validation: All inputs are strictly validated to prevent injection attacks.
security.securityHeaders: Security Headers: The API uses modern security headers to protect against common attacks like XSS and CSRF.
security.https: HTTPS: All communications are encrypted via HTTPS.
security.monitoring: Monitoring: API activity is monitored to identify and block suspicious behavior.
